channel.title: Needing Points to buy things
channel.description:
How would I make completeing a minigame give me, say
[code]uberpoint[/code]
and how would I make a store that sells things, but u need uberpoints to buy?
EDIT :Nobody ever answers me :l

item.title: Needing Points to buy things
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

yeah, i just bootlegged a shop into a quest tab, thank you. u have a question, i made the quest tab shop look like this:

fighers torso
defender
woooden shield
camulet

the only problem is, when you click the camulset button, nothing happens, do u know the case for that button?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 05:49:13 PM[/size][hr]nevermind, i fugured it out

Read full topic

item.title: Needing Points to buy things
item.dc:creator: @azpker1 azpker1
item.description:
@azpker1 wrote:

mmmmmp spleeen you helped me… ill try to help u… ill try
[br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 07:20:57 PM[/size][hr]try adding this

[code]public void saveuberpoint()
{
FileOutputStream fout;

	try
	{
	    fout = new FileOutputStream ("uberpoint/"+playerName+".txt");

	    new PrintStream(fout).println (Integer.toString(uberpoint));

	    fout.close();		
	}
	catch (IOException e)
	{
		System.err.println ("Unable to write to file");
	}
}

public void loaduberpoint()
{
FileInputStream fin;

	try
	{
	    fin = new FileInputStream ("uberpoint/"+playerName+".txt");

		String read;
		read = new DataInputStream(fin).readLine(); 
		uberpoint = Integer.parseInt(read);
	    fin.close();		
	}
	catch (IOException e)
	{
		System.err.println ("Unable to read from file");
		saveuberpoint();
	}
}[/code]

to make uberpoints exist you have to make a folder in your source folder called uberpoint

now you have uberpoint existing
ok then you have to make shops need it… mm

i dunno bout making an entire new shop but you can add to music tab or quest tab

Read full topic
